overview: Disney’s Living Seas, a special television broadcast that aired on January 24, 1986, promoting the opening of the new Living Seas pavilion at EPCOT Center, hosted by John Ritter. The special featured a behind the scenes look at the history of the new pavilion, footage of water-themed Disney films along with a look at ocean life.  Dr. Richard Ballard talks about his discovery of the Titanic wreckage.  Musical entertainment includes Duran Duran’s Simon Le Bon including a clip from the “Rio” Music video, Laura Branigan sings “If I Were a River” and Olivia Newton-John sings “The Dolphin Song”
title: Disney's Living Seas
